column2: " This task consists of refactoring BSP code. The instructions to carry out this category of tasks can be found at http://wiki.rtems.org/wiki/index.php/GoogleCodeInProjects#Refactoring_Board_Support_Packages. Before attempting this task it is strongly suggested that the student first completes one of the Getting Started/Hello World tasks given in the list. The problem statement for this particular task is : powerpc : shared/bspreset.c should be moved to shared/startup/bspreset.c. Modify path of bspreset.c in motorola_powerpc/Makefile.am so as to point to the correct location."
